arts.ttl: Slovakia vs. Germany: FIFA World Cup qualifier team news, match stats and LIVE blog
arts.sum: Germany's road to the 2026 FIFA World Cup begins at the Národný futbalový štadión in Bratislava on Thursday as Julian Nagelsmann's side take on Slovakia in their opening Group A qualifying fixture (kick-off 8.45pm CET). These teams have faced each other 11 times so far, with Germany winning eight and Slovakia three.

arts.ttl: UEFA World Cup Qualifying: Slovakia vs Germany preview, team news & predicted lineups
arts.sum: Germany travel to Bratislava on Thursday to kick off their 2026 World Cup qualifying campaign against Slovakia.

arts.ttl: Two Premier League and four Bayern players: Predicted Germany lineup vs. Slovakia
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Germany could line up for Thursday’s 2026 World Cup qualifier against Slovakia.

arts.ttl: Slovakia vs Germany - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's 2026 World Cup qualifier between Slovakia and Germany, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
